I combine Data and Technology with People Skills to transform businesses, build solutions and solve complex problems.

Contact Me Learn More
years experience
12+

Who I am

I am a First-Generation, Low-Income (FGLI), Neurodivergent, Female Leader in Technology and Business.

My unconventional background, breadth of experience and eternally curious brain makes me great at solving puzzles and finding overlooked connections.

I care deeply about making the world safer, fairer and more compassionate. For this to happen, I believe that access to, and an understanding of, data and technology must become universal.

Next

My Resume

I started my career in tech, took a detour to learn about how businesses (and people) actually work and now I combine the two; offering advisory services through Peculiar Dynamics whilst working on my own ventures.

Employers

I've worked in a wide range of technology-driven companies through my career; completing the rigorous hiring processes at Google and Amazon, pulling the long hours and crazy travel required in consulting, and riding the rollercoaster of life in leadership of Startups.
  1. 2021 - 2023

    Head of People

    Remote patient monitoring medical device development in oncology

    Responsible for developing organisational strategy, technology infrastructure and environments that enable high-performance and high engagement.

Freelance and Advisory

Whilst studying for my MBA, I took on small pieces of technical freelance work, whilst also starting a career coaching business to make the tools and techniques I'd learnt available more widely. I'm not currently pursuing coaching, but I'm always on the lookout for interesting challenges and people!

  • Peculiar Dynamics

    Technology Advisory and Development Services
    2023 -

    Supporting clients to improve, introduce or develop the technology needed to run their business.

  • CoCHA

    Career Coach
    2020-2023

    Working with professionals with a structured approach to navigating the nexts steps of their career.

Education

Despite being the first member of my family to complete secondary education, I've been lucky enough to study at two of the top academic and most competitive universities globally.

My Expertise

I love solving systemic problems, the really complex and/or broad type of challenges that don't fall neatly into a single disclipline. If I had to put some labels on my expertise, I'd probably use the following:

Technology

Business

StrategyBusiness OperationsPeople/ HR FinanceComplianceSales & MarketingComplianceProject & Program Management Risk Management

Organisational BehaviourEmployee EngagementLeadership DevelopmentManagementMotivation and RewardDiversity and Inclusion
